name: socks
text: A comment left by socks was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Homepie, apocowarg, riotnrrd)

name: socks
text: A comment left by socks was marked as spam and excluded. socks: What a douche. (reported by NYU, Magb, Arcibi)

name: deimosrising
text: Ray is not prejudiced his boning is for everyone.

name: nurdbot
text: Pat however, Is. Especially his own relatives. Oh the hilarity!

name: connormc
text: Yeah, is this the only time we ever hear about his sister?

name: catachresis
text: Somehow, the "TO BE CONTINUED" completely makes this strip.

name: zem
text: the last panel stands pretty well on its own

name: jhunt
text: The cocked eyebrow in the last panel makes the strip.  It's the little things...

name: philosophe
text: Arrgh I never read the strips closely enoguh. I always miss something that a comment calls my attention to.

name: factorial
text:
Or the way he sticks his arm out when he says it in the last panel. Hilarious.

Roast Beef just stands there silently listening to the conversation.

name: meetzorp
text: I agree.  It's definitely the eyebrow that pushes this strip into extraordinary territory.

name: dezufnocosem
text: i try to work this into conversations whenever a brother in law comes up...i got about the same reaction

name: perhapsmaybe
text: this would be 5/5 if it was simply the last panel

name: nexus
text: THE BEST STRIP

name: fuckyoufriday
text: "It was real mellow, dig." Man, somebody fast-forward me to intolerable asshole vegan era Pat!

name: hoboninja
text: ...Boned?

name: especial
text:
Why is Reginald whispering "...Boned?" to Beartato?! Oh dear.

More importantly, why is Beartato so excited about it?

name: ganymedeio
text: HAHAHAHA. They are so delighted by the concept. I can see Nedroid doing something like this, especially given his love of Achewood.

name: leon_sumbitches
text: what a sick sense of humour ray.

name: ljuke
text: Whenever I try to explain achewood to a friend, I describe this comic. Badly.

name: tinhand
text: A comment left by tinhand was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by recognizer, twentyfivepast, mighty_pit, mattylite)

name: spectre
text: Alt text: ". . . boned?"

name: crinklebat
text: Fucking classic. Jesus. It's like it isn't even funny anymore because that's how funny it is. As in, this strip is literally so funny I forgot to laugh.

name: greenideas
text: BONE... BONE... BONE...

name: el_cameroni
text:
And you can just hear everybody everywhere all gasping in shock and looking at Ray.

Plus, a new handy expression for every day life!
E.g.
Them: Have you seen my car keys?
You: You mean the car keys that I... boned?

name: farqussus
text:
I think this is why Pat got so angry.

"FUCK YOU RAY YOU DID NOT BONE MY SISTER'S NEW HUSBAND YOU DICK"

name: farqussus
text: I was going to qualify and clarify, but fuck it. It was dumb to post that.

name: nicolae
text: Yes Ray, THAT new husband.

name: quarantine
text: Pat hates bone talk

name: aurorasbored
text: Man, I hate it when that I bone new husbands.

name: sirptom
text: I find it interesting that Onstad originally had all three cats talking like small-time jazz artists.

name: littlefatdog
text: This one would transition to television with hilarious effectiveness, imagine all camera zooming in on Ray with perfect comedic timing all gasping in the background, then it freezes and deep-voiced announcer goes " To be continued... "

name: chromosomecowboy71
text: I love this, the first strip i read, i just had to read em all up to this point, to get te characters, been addicted ever since

name: tragicone
text:
Man, pat's character is way different currently than it is in this strip.

"real mellow, dig?" WHAT!

name: deusoma
text: Yeah, you look at Pat today and you don't exactly get "Beatnik", you know?

name: heccibiggs
text:
While reading through the comments, I kept thinking of the actual strip and laughing all over again.

Hahaha I just did it again.

name: zapatos
text: Yeah, it was pretty funny.  I also laughed.

name: sheriff_mittens
text: A comment left by sheriff_mittens was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by daidai, mystkmanat, littlefatdog)

name: especial
text: Oh, dude, you got lamed. How does that make you feel? How does that make you feel, sheriff mittens?

name: carlyle
text: Probably like shit dude. God. You have to ask.

name: sezza
text: I liked this comment better back when I didn't know that sheriff mittens was the person's actual username instead of just a weird little term of derision you made up.

name: kensai
text: Whenever I try to get my friends into Achewood, this is the strip I show them. It rarely works.

name: theoddwaffle
text: I think the position of Ray's head in panel three really adds a touch of dramatic flair.

name: fakedaisies
text: Pat talks like a beatnik. Never thought I'd say this, but I prefer my Pat curmudgeonly.

name: soup_alex
text:
For some reason, when I recalled this strip having not read it in years, the object of Ray's errant boning was declared to be someone's keys or something.
"Hey uh Ray have you seen my [car?] keys"
"You mean the car keys that I... Boned?"

name: rhadamanthus
text: This was a comment somebody above made.

name: soup_alex
text:
Ofuck, you're absolutely right. I must have read el_cameroni's comment shortly after reading the comic for the first time; clearly, it made an impression on me.

Salut, el_cameroni!

Salut, Rhadamanthus!

name: lolsworth
text: This is the best use of an ellipsis I've ever seen
